thread.title: Joel Embiid: ‘We Have A Chance’ At Playoffs
thread.title_full: Joel Embiid: ‘We Have A Chance’ At Playoffs

author: CBS Philly
title: Joel Embiid: ‘We Have A Chance’ At Playoffs
text:
Joel Embiid: ‘We Have A Chance’ At Playoffs January 9, 2017 9:05 AM By Andrew Porter 
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — To quote Jim Mora , 
“ PLAYOFFS? We’re talkin’ bout playoffs? You kidding me? Playoffs?” 
But after the 76ers’ third win in four games on Sunday, Joel “The Process” Embiid is indeed talking about the playoffs. 
“I think we improved a lot,” Embiid said his team’s 105-95 win over the Nets . “You know, we’ve been playing great basketball. We’ve been winning games. I don’t know, we’re like seven or eight games out of the playoffs, so we have a chance. We’re learning. We’re growing together, learning how to play with each other. It’s just going great now.” 
Related: Joel Embiid Wins 2nd Straight Rookie Of The Month As All-Star Campaign Continues 
The Sixers are 4-6 in their last 10 games, improving to 10-25 and already matching their win total from last season. They are seven and a half games behind the Washington Wizards and Milwaukee Bucks, who are tied for the eighth seed in the eastern conference at 18-18. 
Related: Ben Simmons Travels With Team For First Time 
Of course, the Sixers expect No. 1 overall pick Ben Simmons to return to the lineup at some point. Also, with Nerlens Noel and Jahlil Okafor — who did not play the last two games (coach’s decision) — the Sixers could be involved in the looming March 1st trade deadline. Andrew Porter Follow Andrew Porter was hired by SportsRadio 94WIP in June of 2012.
